```{r load_libraries}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
```

```{r read_data}
pups_data = read_csv("./FAS_pups.csv", col_types = "ciiiii") %>%
clean_names() %>%
gather(key = development_landmark, value = PD_outcome, pd_ears:pd_walk)
```

```{r plot by Zhuyu Qiu}
ggplot(pups_data, aes(x = development_landmark, y = PD_outcome)) + 
  geom_violin(aes(fill = development_landmark), color = "blue", alpha = .5)+geom_boxplot(width=0.03)
```
